titleStmt.title: An advertisement from their Majesties General Post-Office, London it being notorious, that many ill-minded persons, for some wicked designes against the Government, have dispersed in coffee-houses, and other publick places of meeting, divers most infamous scandals of their Majesties General Post-Office; ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Post Office.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
